author: doogie
msg: Fix issues with inventory creation/transfer tests, and with the entity
engine tests, when run with java1.7.  Apparently, the order of methods
returned by reflection varies between runs, so if methods have implicit
requirements on each other, you get spurious errors.
* Combine the separate testCase methods into one
* Make use testCase method completely stand-alone.
The product inventory tests were combined, while the entity engine tests
